summary: You're deep in the work zone - Maupka is gaining momentum with pilots starting soon. Relationships are solid with Ula and your IGNITE network supporting you. Parkour and Japan are waiting for when the busy hump passes.

livingWell: Innovation and building things - Maupka is real and growing
Being good to people - strong mentor and advisor relationships
needsAttention: Physical development - training goals set but not yet executed
Travel and new experiences - Japan dream is deferred
Balance - you noted you're overdoing it
valuesAlignment.note: You wrote: 'I need to get over this busy hump, have that product ready. Then I can relax and start taking my time back.' Trust the process but don't forget to live.

actionables.text: When there's no Claude, there's no work - go train parkour
Plan out Sales & Marketing timeline (Tom's advice)
Get product ready for Saturday grind session with Jayden
Reach out to old contacts - share the tool, thank them

celebration: Major win: Life Dashboard is LIVE! You built a personal companion system that reads your notes and visualizes your life. This is exactly the kind of tool you dreamed about.
friendlyNote: Sam, you're in the thick of it. The pilot is coming, the funding plan is solid, and you're building something real. Remember your own words: 'A plan without a deadline is just a dream.' But also remember: 'Give yourself twice the time and chill is better.' You've got this.

balanceCheck.recommendation: You're productive but noted you're overdoing it. Quality depletes fast. Leave and only do so much work.
